General.Name: HeraMED Ltd
General.Description: HeraMED Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells foetal heart beat monitors and other pregnancy monitoring solutions for home use in Australia, Europe, and Israel. It also provides HeraBEAT, a fetal heart rate monitor use by an expectant mother to monitor their fetus' heartbeat; and HeraCARE, a cloud-based remote maternity care platform. The company has a collaboration agreement with Mayo Clinic for the development of its HeraCARE pregnancy management platform. HeraMED Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Netanya, Israel.
